caller_intent: Frank Harris wanted to review his insurance policies with Alliance Insurance, specifically his homeowners and renters policies, to ensure coverage details were accurate and up-to-date.
resolution_steps: Agent Brandy confirmed Frank's contact information, mailing address, and email.
Verified Jennifer's contact details as a secondary contact.
Reviewed Frank's homeowners policy, explaining coverage amounts (home rebuild, other structures, personal property, loss of use, liability, medical payments).
Discussed deductible amounts for wind/hail and general claims.
Addressed roof construction date discrepancy and confirmed no updates.
Confirmed no rental income or home-based business.
Notified Frank about flood/earthquake coverage exclusions.
Verified Truist Bank as the mortgagee.
Noted existence of a renters policy for Chase at a different address.
knowledge_required: Insurance underwriting details (roof age, property use)
summary: Brandy conducted an annual policy review with Frank Harris, confirming his homeowners policy details, explaining coverage limits, and identifying a separate renters policy. The call included verification of contact information, mortgage details, and clarification of coverage exclusions. Frank indicated no changes to his policy and no immediate questions.
